translation.en: [Helena Bonham Carter] Every living creature starts life as a baby.
translation.ko: 모든 생명체는 아기로 태어나 삶을 시작합니다

translation.en: For each, there's a whole new world to discover.
There'll be joy,
and friendship.
But life also brings challenges.
Some have devoted parents to protect them.
translation.ko: 부모의 극진한 보호를 받는 새끼가 있는 반면

translation.en: Others must fight every step of the way.
translation.ko: 필사적으로 자신을 지키며 살아가야 하는 새끼도 있습니다

translation.en: These newborns will never be more vulnerable.
translation.ko: 갓 태어났을 때만큼 취약한 시기도 없죠

translation.en: The journey toward adulthood will be hard.
To survive takes courage,
determination…
and above all…
love…
for babies born wild.
The windswept shores of the Namib Desert,
where barren sand dunes run down to the icy sea.
translation.ko: 메마른 사구들이 얼음장 같은 바다를 향해 늘어선 곳이죠

translation.en: It doesn't seem possible for life to exist here.
And yet…
…a colony of Cape fur seals.
Around 4,000 of them.
These marine mammals spend most of the year at sea.
translation.ko: 이 해양 포유류는 보통 바다에서 생활합니다

translation.en: But now, in summer, females gather on land to give birth.
translation.ko: 지금처럼 여름이 되면 암컷들이 새끼를 낳으려고 육지에 모여들죠

translation.en: Amorous males are here too.
They've turned this isolated beach into one noisy, chaotic seal hub.
translation.ko: 이 외딴 해변을 시끄럽고 무질서한 물개 요충지로 만든 주범이죠

translation.en: In the midst of it all…
after eight months of pregnancy…
…a new life
is about to begin.
At last, making his entrance into the world,
little Tabo.
A male, weighing just 13 pounds.
In these first seconds,
his senses are flooded by the rowdy colony around him.
translation.ko: 새끼의 감각은 주위를 둘러싼 시끄러운 무리에 압도됩니다

translation.en: But his only focus right now is on his mom.
For her, it's love at first sight.
translation.ko: 어미는 새끼를 보는 순간 사랑에 빠집니다

translation.en: She's naturally protective of her precious new baby.
translation.ko: 방금 태어난 귀한 새끼를 본능적으로 보호할 줄 알죠

translation.en: Giving Tabo his first wash, she takes in his distinct smell.
translation.ko: 타보의 몸을 처음 닦아주며 특유의 체취를 들이마십니다

translation.en: And their unique calls will help them recognize each other
translation.ko: 서로를 알아볼 수 있도록 독특한 소리도 내죠

translation.en: against the clamor of the colony.
Until he can swim, in six weeks' time,
translation.ko: 헤엄을 칠 수 있을 때까지 앞으로 6주 동안

translation.en: he's totally dependent on her for all his food and protection.
translation.ko: 타보는 어미에게 전적으로 의지할 겁니다 먹이 수급과 울타리 역할까지 전부 다요

translation.en: Right now, he's ready for his first milk.
translation.ko: 이제 어미의 젖을 처음으로 맛보려고 합니다

translation.en: High in calories and full of fat, it will help Tabo grow and put on weight.
translation.ko: 고열량에 지방 함량도 높아서 타보의 성장과 체중 증가에 도움이 될 테죠

translation.en: But it won't last forever.
To keep him healthy, soon his mom must return to sea to find food.
translation.ko: 타보가 건강히 자라려면 어미가 바다로 곧 돌아가 영양을 보충해야 하니까요

translation.en: It will mean leaving Tabo alone and defenseless.
translation.ko: 타보를 무방비 상태로 놔두고 가야 한다는 뜻입니다

translation.en: Here in the colony, there's safety in numbers,
but this is far from being one big, happy family.
Other mothers only have eyes for their own pups.
translation.ko: 다른 어미들은 자기 새끼 말고는 관심이 없습니다

translation.en: And amongst these bulls, there's no such thing as fatherly care.
translation.ko: 이 성난 수컷들 사이에서 부성애라고는 찾아볼 수 없고요

translation.en: Tabo will have to face life in this large crowd of strangers
translation.ko: 타보는 거대한 낯선 무리 틈에서 살아가야 합니다

translation.en: all by himself,
as his precious time with his mom grows short.
translation.ko: 어미와 함께할 소중한 시간도 이제 얼마 남지 않았죠

translation.en: For new arrivals, it's hard to start life out in the open.
translation.ko: 노출된 곳에서 살아가는 갓난 새끼들의 삶은 고달픕니다

translation.en: Other babies are wisely hidden from the moment of birth,
translation.ko: 반면 출생 순간부터 영리하게 숨어 지내는 새끼들도 있죠

translation.en: especially when they're destined to be rulers of the African savanna.
In a palm thicket hideout,
new life.
Three lion cubs.
Two sons and a daughter,
only four weeks old.
With eyes just opened,
they take their first faltering steps in this big new world.
translation.ko: 거대한 세상 속으로 첫걸음마를 휘청 내딛습니다

translation.en: While the boys explore…
Kaya, the little female, hangs back with Mom.
translation.ko: 암컷 카야는 어미 곁에 남아 어울리죠

translation.en: Unlike her brothers,
she'll spend her whole life with her pride.
translation.ko: 카야는 평생 무리를 떠나지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: The bond between lionesses is strong from the very start.
translation.ko: 암사자들 간의 유대는 처음부터 아주 끈끈하죠

translation.en: Her elder brother is already displaying confidence.
But Kaya is more reserved.
translation.ko: 반면 카야는 좀 더 내성적인 편이죠

translation.en: She'll have to be brave
if she's to overcome the dangers these cubs face.
Their spotty coats camouflage them for a reason.
translation.ko: 얼룩무늬 털로 위장하는 것도 다 이유가 있습니다

translation.en: In this dog-eat-dog world,
every other predator here would kill these newborn cubs.
translation.ko: 갓 태어난 새끼를 노리는 포식자들이 즐비하니까요

translation.en: That's if they can get past Mom.
translation.ko: 물론 어미의 보호망을 뚫어야 가능한 일이지만요

translation.en: She's their fiercest protector.
For the next four weeks,
she'll do everything she can to keep her babies hidden
translation.ko: 어미는 모든 방법을 동원해 새끼들을 숨길 겁니다

translation.en: until they're strong enough to join their pride.
translation.ko: 무리에 합류할 만큼 강하게 자랄 때까지요

translation.en: For many new arrivals,
the protection of a family is the only thing keeping them safe.
But sometimes, family decisions can also lead to trouble.
translation.ko: 하지만 가족의 결정 때문에 곤경에 처할 때도 있죠

translation.en: Meet little Jasiri,
an elephant calf just a few weeks old.
translation.ko: 태어난 지 몇 주밖에 안 된 새끼 코끼리죠

translation.en: He's so young, he's still finding his feet.
translation.ko: 너무 어려서 걷는 것도 아직 익숙지 않습니다

translation.en: Born in the dry grasslands of Northern Kenya…
…life for this little calf will mean constant traveling…
…while trying to keep up with his mom in a sea of tree trunks.
translation.ko: 거대한 다리들 사이에서 어미를 놓치지 않으려 애씁니다

translation.en: In their search for fresh grass, this family can walk over ten miles a day.
translation.ko: 신선한 풀을 찾아 이 가족은 하루에 15km 이상 족히 걸을 수 있죠

translation.en: But with a baby in tow, they'll always slow down.
translation.ko: 하지만 새끼를 데리고 다닐 땐 속도를 늦춥니다

translation.en: Like most babies, little Jasiri needs regular milk and rest.
translation.ko: 평범한 다른 새끼들처럼 꼬마 자시리도 규칙적으로 젖을 먹고 쉬어야 합니다

translation.en: But they can't stop for too long.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 오래 멈출 순 없죠

translation.en: It's time to go.
But keeping such little legs on the move sometimes requires gentle persuasion.
translation.ko: 이렇게 작은 다리를 움직이게 하려면 부드럽게 설득해야 할 때도 있죠

translation.en: After their morning's grazing, the herd move on to the river.
translation.ko: 아침에 풀을 뜯고 나면 무리는 강으로 이동합니다

translation.en: All that fiber for breakfast leaves them thirsty.
translation.ko: 섬유질이 풍부한 아침 식사 덕에 목이 마르니까요

translation.en: But the river is key to their lives for another reason.
translation.ko: 이들에게 강이 중요한 이유는 따로 있습니다

translation.en: It's where the clans gather.
-[elephant trumpets] -Old friends catch up.
And youngsters get together for a pool party.
translation.ko: 어린 녀석들끼리 물장난을 치며 어울리기도 하죠

translation.en: In fact, everyone has fun,
whatever their age.
All except Jasiri.
He could easily get lost in a crowd this big.
translation.ko: 이렇게 많이 모인 곳에선 길을 잃기 쉽죠

translation.en: After nearly two years of pregnancy…
…Mom keeps her precious baby as close as possible.
translation.ko: 이 귀중한 아기를 최대한 가까이 두려고 합니다

translation.en: Some of the family are wading further out.
translation.ko: 가족 일부는 강 건너편으로 이동 중이죠

translation.en: Elephants crisscross this river every day,
driven to find fresh grass.
But Mom's instinct tells her that today's conditions aren't right.
translation.ko: 그러나 어미는 본능적으로 오늘은 여의치 않다고 느낍니다

translation.en: Stored in her remarkable memory is almost every crossing she's ever made.
translation.ko: 매번 건넜던 강의 상태를 빠짐없이 기억하고 있으니까요

translation.en: She knows the water holds many dangers.
translation.ko: 강의 잠재적 위험에 대해서도 잘 압니다

translation.en: Shifting sands create deep channels of turbulent water…
translation.ko: 강바닥의 모래가 이동하며 만든 깊은 수심과 거센 물줄기가

translation.en: that can sweep a tiny calf
right off its feet.
She'll have to decide.
Either she follows her family
and risks her calf's life…
or they get separated from the herd,
where neither is likely to survive.
translation.ko: 작별할 경우 둘 다 살아남지 못할 겁니다

translation.en: For every new arrival,
some of the hardest lessons occur
translation.ko: 힘겨운 고생 끝에 큰 깨달음을 얻죠

translation.en: when one of the simplest rules of survival is broken.
translation.ko: 가장 간단한 생존 규칙을 깨면 벌어지는 일입니다

translation.en: Staying where it's safe.
On the desert sand in Namibia,
Tabo's been lapping up all his mom's attention.
translation.ko: 타보는 엄마의 관심을 한껏 누리고 있습니다

translation.en: One week old, he's looking fat and healthy.
translation.ko: 생후 1주 만에 살도 제법 오르고 건강해 보이네요

translation.en: But he's blissfully unaware that life is about to change.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 행복한 나머지 삶의 변화를 목전에 둔 걸 모르고 있습니다

translation.en: His mom must go and feed at sea.
translation.ko: 어미는 바다로 나가 배를 채워야 합니다

translation.en: Until she returns, little Tabo must be brave and stay put.
translation.ko: 어미가 돌아올 때까지 꼬마 타보는 용감하게 자리를 지켜야 하죠

translation.en: Alone for the very first time.
He desperately looks for her…
and immediately breaks Mom's first rule.
translation.ko: 그리고 곧장 어미의 첫 번째 규칙을 어깁니다

translation.en: "Don't wander off."
No other mother here will care for him.
translation.ko: 다른 어미들은 타보를 돌봐주지 않을 겁니다

translation.en: It's a tough lesson to learn.
His searching puts him right in the path of some heavy traffic.
translation.ko: 어미를 찾아 헤매다 보니 체증이 심한 길목에 다다랐습니다

translation.en: These 500-pound males have just one thing on their mind.
translation.ko: 230kg에 육박하는 수컷들의 머릿속엔 한 가지 생각뿐이죠

translation.en: To mate with females.
They steamroll over anyone who gets in their way.
Tabo's had a lucky escape.
But with every step he takes…
he's wandering further into trouble.
It might be scary inside the colony…
but it's even more dangerous outside.
translation.ko: 하지만 무리 밖은 훨씬 더 위험하죠

translation.en: Stray pups like Tabo are exactly what this predator is looking for.
translation.ko: 타보처럼 떠돌아다니는 새끼야말로 이 포식자가 노리는 표적이니까요

translation.en: A new day in the African bush…
and the cubs are being shown the boundary of their secret hideaway.
translation.ko: 새끼들은 비밀 은신처가 어디까지인지 배우는 중이죠

translation.en: While her brothers stick close to their mom,
Kaya is struggling to keep up.
That's why, until they're a couple of months old,
translation.ko: 이런 이유로 새끼들은 두 달이 지날 때까지

translation.en: cubs are kept separate from their family.
Lions cover huge distances following prey.
translation.ko: 사자는 먹잇감을 따라 엄청나게 먼 거리를 다닙니다

translation.en: And not too far away, that's exactly what their family is doing.
translation.ko: 실제로 그리 멀지 않은 곳에서 새끼들의 가족 역시 먹이를 노리고 있죠

translation.en: This is the MalaMala pride…
rulers of a prime spot of territory along the Sand River.
translation.ko: 샌드강 유역의 주요 영역을 차지한 통치자들이죠

translation.en: Six lionesses and 14 teenage cubs,
led by a powerful coalition of brothers.
translation.ko: 강력한 수사자 형제가 힘을 합쳐 이끌고 있습니다

translation.en: But right now, this pride has a problem.
translation.ko: 하지만 지금 이 무리는 난관에 부딪혔습니다

translation.en: A herd of buffalo.
Each one, half a ton of aggression with razor-sharp horns
translation.ko: 날카로운 뿔을 지닌 500kg 체급의 이 사나운 동물은

translation.en: that can easily kill a lion.
So the pride must surround them and single one out.
translation.ko: 그래서 버펄로를 포위한 후 한 마리를 고립시켜야 하죠

translation.en: But
the tables have turned.
These teenagers are nervous, incompetent hunters.
translation.ko: 이 어린 사냥꾼들은 움츠러든 데다 서투르죠

translation.en: They're messing it up for the rest of the pride.
As another hunt fails, tempers are running high.
translation.ko: 사냥에 또 실패하자 가족의 분위기도 격앙되죠

translation.en: Soon, Kaya and her brothers must join this family.
translation.ko: 곧 카야와 카야의 형제들도 가족들과 함께해야 합니다

translation.en: But when fights break out…
young cubs can get injured if they're caught in the line of fire.
translation.ko: 어린 새끼들이 휘말려 다칠 수도 있죠

translation.en: It's a risk Mom can't take.
She'll have to keep Kaya and her brothers hidden for now.
translation.ko: 당분간 카야와 두 녀석을 잘 숨겨야 하죠

translation.en: But life is tough being a single mom.
translation.ko: 그러나 싱글 맘으로 지내는 건 고된 일입니다

translation.en: She'll have to hunt alone,
and there's no guarantee that she'll find enough food
translation.ko: 새끼들을 먹여 살릴 만큼 먹이를 구할 수 있을지도

translation.en: to keep her cubs alive.
For a baby born wild,
survival often depends on the decisions of your family.
translation.ko: 가족의 결정에 따라 판가름 나는 때가 많습니다

translation.en: In Kenya, little Jasiri is about to get a valuable first lesson
translation.ko: 케냐의 꼬마 자시리도 귀중한 첫 교훈을 얻을 참이죠

translation.en: on trust and judgment.
While he's enjoying a closely supervised paddle…
translation.ko: 세심한 보호 속에 물장구를 치고 있는데요

translation.en: his mom seems anxious.
Her family intend to cross the river.
As they finally decide to go…
she has no option but to follow.
Ahead, it's suddenly clear the family have made a rash decision.
translation.ko: 앞선 가족들을 보니 성급한 결정임이 분명해집니다

translation.en: Some of the older calves are in trouble.
translation.ko: 좀 더 자란 새끼들이 곤경에 처했습니다

translation.en: And Jasiri's mom is having second thoughts.
translation.ko: 그래서 자시리의 어미는 다시 고민에 빠졌죠

translation.en: But as the calves find their footing…
translation.ko: 하지만 녀석들이 안전한 바닥을 딛고 나아가자…

translation.en: she's forced to try again.
translation.ko: 어미도 어쩔 수 없이 뒤를 따릅니다

translation.en: Using her trunk, she gauges the speed of the current…
and tests the stability of the sand.
Jasiri shelters nervously beneath her.
translation.ko: 자시리는 불안해하며 어미 몸을 방패 삼아 걷죠

translation.en: But he's caught by the current.
Her worst nightmare has come true.
She just about manages to support him with her trunk.
But they're still a distance from the bank.
The current takes Jasiri again.
She's only got seconds.
Ahead, the rapids will sweep him away for good.
translation.ko: 더 가면 급류에 휩쓸려 영영 돌아오지 못할 테니까요

translation.en: Just in time,
she catches him.
Family help is on the way.
Together, they form a wall of bodies to block the current…
translation.ko: 서로 몸을 맞대 물살을 막을 벽을 만듭니다

translation.en: and Jasiri is guided across.
translation.ko: 가족의 인도에 따라 자시리도 강을 건너죠

translation.en: At last…
weak and exhausted, he's safe.
On his journey through life,
there'll be many rivers to cross,
but this first one will never be forgotten.
translation.ko: 이 첫 번째 경험은 절대로 잊지 못할 겁니다

translation.en: Only time will tell if this harrowing experience
translation.ko: 이 괴로운 경험이 가족에 대한 자시리의 신뢰에 어떤 영향을 미칠지는

translation.en: will affect Jasiri's trust in his family in the months to come.
translation.ko: 가족에 대한 자시리의 신뢰에 어떤 영향을 미칠지는 시간이 지나야만 알 수 있겠죠

translation.en: In Namibia,
it's been 48 hours since Tabo's mom went to sea.
translation.ko: 타보의 어미가 바다로 떠난 지 48시간이 지났죠

translation.en: In searching for her, he's become lost.
With no friends in the colony to turn to,
he's vulnerable.
A brown hyena…
drawn in by the irresistible smell of seal pups.
translation.ko: 구미를 당기는 새끼 물개의 냄새에 이끌렸죠

translation.en: She's looking for those that have been left on their own.
Tabo's only chance is to get back inside the colony.
translation.ko: 타보가 목숨을 건질 방법은 무리로 돌아가는 것뿐이죠

translation.en: But his wanderings have left him hot and dehydrated.
translation.ko: 하지만 헤매는 동안 더위를 먹어 탈수 상태가 됐습니다

translation.en: He makes it close to the shore…
but that's as far as he can go.
Tabo has been spotted.
Wary of an adult's bite,
the hyena checks for Mom.
Tabo needs her now more than ever.
translation.ko: 타보는 그 어느 때보다 어미가 필요합니다

translation.en: She hears her son's desperate cries.
Tabo is safe for now.
But with the pupping season in full swing…
translation.ko: 하지만 새끼를 낳는 시기가 절정에 이른 만큼

translation.en: other predators are on the prowl.
Soon, Tabo will need all the courage and bravery he can muster
translation.ko: 조만간 타보도 용기를 최대치로 끌어모아 대비해야 할 겁니다

translation.en: when more danger comes calling.
